<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" tools:context=".PostShareFragment">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Back Arrow --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/backButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackground" android:src="@drawable/arrow_back" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Title Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/titleText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="ĐĂNG TIN CHIA SẺ KỸ NĂNG" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/backButton" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Label for Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tiêu đề" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/titleText" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Input for Title --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/titleInputLayout" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:boxStrokeColor="#B0BEC5" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelTitle">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/titleInput" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Hướng dẫn thuyết trình hiệu quả" android:inputType="text" android:padding="12dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Label for Description --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelDescription" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mô tả chi tiết" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/titleInputLayout" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Input for Description --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/descriptionInputLayout" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:boxStrokeColor="#B0BEC5" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelDescription">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/descriptionInput" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Mô tả phương pháp, kinh nghiệm..." android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="3" android:padding="12dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Label for Skill --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelSkill" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Gắn thẻ kỹ năng môn học" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/descriptionInputLayout" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Spinner for Skill with Enhanced Border --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/skillInputLayout" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:boxStrokeColor="#B0BEC5" app:boxStrokeWidth="2dp" <!-- Increased border width for visibility --> app:endIconMode="dropdown" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelSkill">
<Spinner android:id="@+id/skillDropdown" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:backgroundTint="#B0BEC5" android:padding="12dp" android:spinnerMode="dropdown" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Label for Time Assistance --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelTimeSupport" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thời gian hỗ trợ" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/skillInputLayout" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Input for Time Assistance --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/timeSupportInputLayout" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:boxStrokeColor="#B0BEC5" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelTimeSupport">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/timeSupportInput" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="datetime" android:padding="12dp" android:text="Tối thứ 2, 4, 6 - từ 19h đến 21h" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Label for Price --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelPrice" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mức phí (nếu có)" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/timeSupportInputLayout" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Input for Price --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/priceInputLayout" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:boxStrokeColor="#B0BEC5" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelPrice">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/priceInput" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:padding="12dp" android:text="50000 VND/h" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/submitButton" android:layout_width="179dp" android:layout_height="54dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:backgroundTint="#D32F2F" android:text="Đăng Tin" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="16sp" app:cornerRadius="24dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_dialog_info" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/priceInputLayout" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> </FrameLayout>
